channel.title: Development-RuneLegend
channel.description:
[b]Welcome to my topic to advertise you to help/join the RuneLegend Server :) ![/b]
[b]About the Server :[/b] RuneLegend is a New Growing Community Server , It is also going to have a New Growing Community Forum. This is going to be the Best Server of the Year :P !
[b]Features :[/b]
[ul][li]RuneScape Specials[/li] [li]RuneScape Firemaking[/li] [li]RuneScape Woodcutting[/li] [li]50% RuneScape Emotes[/li] [li]RuneScape Fishing[/li] [li]RuneScape Pest Control[/li] [li]RuneScape Mini games[/li] [li]55% RuneScape Farming[/li] [li]RuneScape Vengance[/li] [li]More to Come[/li][/ul]
[b]Jobs :[/b] [b]Server Coders :[/b] *Sgt Master* *Open* *Open* *Open* *Open* *Open* [b]Client Coders :[/b] *Sgt Master* *Open* *Open* *Open* *Open* *Open* [b]Server Testers[/b] *Sgt Master* *moparRuler* *Open* *Open* *Open* *Open* [b]Idea Makers[/b] *Sgt Master* *moparRuler* *Open* *Open* *Open* *Open*
[b]Layout :[/b] [code]Name *Forum Name & Real Name* : Job Wanted : Proof of What you Did : Daily Time online : Will you Stay Active :[/code]
[b]Note: Forums Will Be Made ![/b] Thanks/Regrets , Sgt Master

item.title: Development-RuneLegend
item.dc:creator: @moparRuler moparRuler
item.description:
@moparRuler wrote:

Ok I have an idea. Ok you know wirthbirth island or something like that? ok make it so you can get their by a boat. Then once their u see a zammy and sara mages. Then when you talk to zammy he gives u a zammy cape if u put on u join them in a war, if not then u join sara. And you then get teleported to an area where thier is all this npc attacking each other then all suddent all zammy or sara depending who u joined start attacking u. Once you win you get some kinda reward. What u think?

Read full topic
